description: In recent weeks, Ukraine launched a surprise attack into Russia, taking land and capturing Russian prisoners of war. Today, The Post’s Ukraine bureau chief, Isabelle Khurshudyan, explains how Ukraine’s incursion may change the trajectory of the war.
title: The strategy behind Ukraine’s move into Russia

description: In Lebanon’s impoverished south, where Hezbollah holds sway and attacks have been most intense, Syrian refugees have borne the brunt of the recent violence.
title: As Hezbollah and Israel step up attacks, ailing Lebanon fears the worst

description: As Moscow’s forces gain ground in Ukraine’s east, some are questioning why Kyiv is devoting so many resources to taking Russian land rather than defending its own.
title: Ukrainians cheer push into Russia but fear it comes at the cost of the east

description: Six bodies of Israeli hostages being held by Hamas in Gaza were recovered on Tuesday from a tunnel below Khan Younis.
title: Israeli military says recovered hostages’ bodies had gunshot wounds

description: The country’s security service said the journalist would be placed on Russia’s wanted list. Under Russian law, the maximum penalty for illegally crossing the border is five years in prison.
title: Russia opens case against CNN reporter who covered Kursk incursion

description: Lucara Diamond discovered the world's second largest diamond in Botswana's Karowe mine using Mega Diamond Recovery X-ray technology.
title: Second-largest diamond ever, 2,492 carats, unearthed in Botswana

description: The U.S. has never had a woman president but it’s far from alone. Enter your birthday to find out the number of women who have led around the world.
title: How many women presidents and prime ministers have served in your lifetime?

description: Guatemalan officials announced the dismantling of a smuggling ring behind the deadliest incident of its kind on U.S. soil, in which 53 migrants died.
title: New arrests in smuggling of migrants who died in a Texas truck

description: The body of Lynch, 59, was recovered from the wreckage of the Bayesian, according to an Italian government official. The Bayesian yacht sank in a storm this week.
title: Mike Lynch’s body is sixth found in yacht wreckage; daughter is last missing

description: Authorities accused two people of planning attacks on Swift’s Vienna shows, prompting their cancellation. Swift said she waited until the end of her Eras Tour European leg to speak out.
title: Taylor Swift opens up about Vienna concert attack threat: ‘New sense of fear’
